sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The liba52 package contains a52dec, extract_a52 and liba52.

sect3.title: a52dec
sect3.para: a52dec plays ATSC A/52 audio streams.

sect3.title: extract_a52
sect3.para: extract_a52 extracts ATSC A/52 audio from a MPEG stream.

sect3.title: liba52
sect3.para: liba52 provides functions for the programs dealing with ATSC A/52 streams.
